items.summary: Create a new Withdrawal page (frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx) that displays four withdrawal amount buttons: ₹100, ₹200, ₹500, and ₹1000. The user should be able to tap a button to select that amount, with the selected amount visually highlighted. Style it consistently with the existing dark navy/gold theme.

Add a 'Withdraw' navigation entry to the bottom navigation bar (BottomNav.tsx) or make the Withdrawal page accessible from the Account page via a 'Withdraw' button, so users can navigate to the new Withdrawal page.
